name: Ideas of Mathematics
description: This is a one-term course to give students extensive practice in the writing of mathematics. The format will be to study excellent expositions of important ideas of mathematics and then to assign short writing assignments based on them. [36L, 12T] Limited enrolment. The course is open only to students in the MAT major/specialist programs, with priority to students in the specialist program and to CTEP students.
prerequisites: Completion of the second-year requirements for the Major and Specialists Programs in Mathematical Sciences.
